articles.title: Ryan Preece wins Cook Out Clash at Bowman Gray amid winter weather - NASCAR.com
articles.description: Ryan Preece won the 2026 Cook Out Clash at Bowman Gray Stadium, overcoming winter weather in a Wednesday night feature.

articles.title: Jeff Stoutland will no longer be Eagles OL coach after 13 seasons - NFL.com
articles.description: Jeff Stoutland, one of the NFL's most revered offensive line coaches, and the Philadelphia Eagles are parting ways following 13 seasons, NFL Network Insiders Ian Rapoport,  Mike Garafolo and Tom Pelissero reported Wednesday.

articles.description: McKenna faces up to 20 years in prison if found guilty.

articles.description: It was only a matter of time before the Bulls moved White, who was part of the team's third trade in the last 24 hours. White joined Nikola Vucevic and Kevin Huerter, who were traded Tuesday. The deadline is 2 p.m. Thursday.
